Name: Amount
Notes: The daily budget. On the Campaign Performance Report this column reflects the entire shared budget if the campaign draws from a shared budget.

Name: AssociatedCampaignId
Notes: The ID of a Campaign associated with the Budget.

Name: AssociatedCampaignName
Notes: The name of a Campaign associated with the Budget.

Name: AssociatedCampaignStatus
Enum Values:
ENABLED / enabled
PAUSED / paused
REMOVED / removed
UNKNOWN / unknown
Notes:
The status of a Campaign associated with the Budget.
Predicate values / display values:
ENABLED / enabled
PAUSED / paused
REMOVED / removed
UNKNOWN / unknown

Name: AverageCpc
Notes: The total cost of all clicks divided by the total number of clicks received.

Name: AverageCpm
Notes: Average Cost-per-thousand impressions (CPM).

Name: AveragePosition
Notes: Your ad's position relative to those of other advertisers.

Name: BudgetCampaignAssociationStatus
Enum Values:
ENABLED / Enabled
REMOVED / Removed
UNKNOWN / unknown
Notes:
The status of the association between the Budget and the associated Campaign.
Predicate values / display values:
ENABLED / Enabled
REMOVED / Removed
UNKNOWN / unknown

Name: BudgetId
Notes: The ID of the Budget.

Name: BudgetName
Notes: The name of the Budget.

Name: BudgetReferenceCount
Notes: The number of campaigns actively using the budget.

Name: BudgetStatus
Enum Values:
ENABLED / Enabled
REMOVED / Removed
UNKNOWN / unknown
Notes:
The status of the Budget.
Predicate values / display values:
ENABLED / Enabled
REMOVED / Removed
UNKNOWN / unknown

Name: Clicks
Notes: The number of clicks.

Name: ConversionRateManyPerClick
Notes: The number of conversions divided by total clicks that can be tracked to conversions. Percentage returned as "x.xx%".

Name: ConversionValue
Notes: The sum of conversion values for all conversions.

Name: ConversionsManyPerClick
Notes: This column reports total conversions, across all the conversion actions you're tracking. How you've chosen to count your conversions (unique or all) affects the number shown in this column.

Name: Cost
Notes: The sum of your cost-per-click (CPC) and cost-per-thousand impressions (CPM) costs during this period. Other costs such as cost-per-call aren't included. For a sum of all costs, use the TotalCost column.

Name: Ctr
Notes: The number of clicks your ad receives (Clicks) divided by the number of times your ad is shown (Impressions). Percentage returned as "x.xx%".

Name: Impressions
Notes: Count of how often your ad has appeared on a search results page or website on the Google Network.

Name: IsBudgetExplicitlyShared
Notes:
Predicate values / display values:
TRUE / true
FALSE / false

Name: ValuePerConversionManyPerClick
Notes: The total value of all conversions divided by the total number of conversions.

Name: ViewThroughConversions
Notes: The value, on average, of your total estimated conversions.
